SBC_MotoDriver3.StepperSpeed|block: Set the speed of the Stepper to %speed rpm with %steps steps
SBC_MotoDriver3.Stepper|block: Move the stepper motor %stepAmount steps on %pin1, %pin2, %pin3, %pin4
SBC_MotoDriver3.begin|block: Set up and start the communication
SBC_MotoDriver3.enable|block: Set the enablepin to %SBC_MotoDriver3pin and enable/disable the outputs ? %state
SBC_MotoDriver3.fadeIn|block: Fade in channel %pin over %timer milliseconds to %brightness
SBC_MotoDriver3.fadeOut|block: Fade out channel %pin over %timer milliseconds to %brightness
SBC_MotoDriver3.pwmStatus|block: Read the pwm status of channel %pin
